
pysmvt Changelog
==================

Version ??
-----------
(??, release date to be announced)

Version 0.2.1
-------------
(bugfix, released on 2010-05-30)

- last version was borked, it didn't contain up-to-date code

Version 0.2.0
-------------
(bugfixes/features/**BC BREAKS!!**, released on May 30th 2010)

- this release definitely includes BC BREAKS!
- see bitbucket changesets: http://bitbucket.org/rsyring/pysmvt/changesets

Version 0.1.1
-------------
(bugfix release, released on May 15th 2009)

- renamed the attribute `implicit_seqence_conversion` attribute of the
  request object to `implicit_sequence_conversion`.
